subject: Update: AI_START_HERE messaging + drift snapshot
content: AI_START_HERE.md updated: added Active Systems + Messaging map row; Quick Start now points to tasks.db. Drift snapshot: missing docs (docs/EXTERNAL_AGENTS_PIPELINE.md, docs/PROMPTS_WORKFLOWS.md), tasks.json vs tasks.db inconsistencies, artifacts protocol not implemented, sentinel gates incomplete, onboarding references .YBIS_Dev paths.
